mandate: Proactive filtering of M-01 precursors based on standing policy and bias vectors.
function: Asynchronously monitor input streams for nascent M-01 generation.
Validate proposed intents against the Policy Rule Source (RSAM).
Calculate Non-Compliance Probability (NCP) and Bias Trace Vector (BTV).
Abort intents that exceed defined NCP thresholds before they initiate GSEP Stage 1.
integration: Invoked prior to GSEP Stage 1 (Policy Vetting & Scoping), feeding only pre-vetted intents to the GCO.
